disclaimer.text:
Please make sure you are eligible for getting your record cleared. If you need help with this please look at our FAQ.

Be aware your statement is stored locally on your device, and never transmitted to our servers or any third-party.

This software is developed by a non-governmental third party, Hack for LA.

Please allocate enough time to complete this.

Please also review our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use before beginning.

welcomePage.description: This tool will guide you through writing your declaration letter. You can preview your letter and make changes at the end of each section.

advicePage.header: Advice for a successful declaration letter
advicePage.point1:
1. Avoid using informal language, such as abbreviations or slang.
	• Do not use profanity.
	• Don’t Use - dude, gig, pov
	• Use - Mr./Mrs. (last name), job, point of view
advicePage.point2:
2. Write in complete sentences and remember to use punctuation at the end.
	• Don’t Use - expunge my record because I need a new job
	• Use - I want to expunge my record because I want to apply for jobs.
advicePage.point3: 3. Use first person when answering questions. You are telling your story from your point of view.
advicePage.point4: 4. Keep your responses between 3-5 sentences for each section.

step2.description: Now that you have introduced yourself, it’s time to start writing your letter.

step3.description:
Now that you have completed the first section of your letter, it’s time to write the next section.

Take a break now if you need one.

step4.description:
Now that you have completed the second section of your letter, it’s time to write the final section.

Take a break now if you need one.

step5.description:
Just one more step. Next, you can preview your entire letter and make changes.

When you are done, email or download a copy of your letter.

introduction_form.isVeteran_label: Are you a veteran of the United States of America? (y/n)

involvement_form.checkboxgroup_label:
What have you been involved with since your conviction?

Check all that apply:

job_form.companyName_input_label: What is the name of the company you work for?
job_form.jobTitle_input_label: What is your current job title?
job_form.jobDescription_input_label:
What do you do at this job? How has your role at work impacted your life for the better?
(2-3 complete sentences)

unemployed_form.unemploymentDescription_input_label:
Describe how and why you are having trouble finding work.
(2-3 complete sentences)

community_service_form.organizationName_input_label: What is the name of the community service organization that you are involved with?
community_service_form.serviceDescription_input_label:
What do you do at this community service organization? How has your volunteer work impacted your life for the better?
(2-3 complete sentences)

recovery_form.recoveryName_input_label: What is the name of the recovery program you are involved with?
recovery_form.recoveryDescription_input_label:
Why is this recovery program important to you?
(2-3 complete sentences)

education_form.schoolName_input_label:
What is the name of the school or educational program you are attending?
This can include a four year university, community college, trade school, GED preparation, etc.
education_form.studyName_input_placeholder: Name of subject/study area, or program
education_form.passionDescription_input_label:
Why have you chosen to study this? Why does it matter to you?
(2-3 complete sentences)

parenting_form.childName_input_label: What is the name of your child?
parenting_form.parentDescription_input_label:
What is important about parenting for you now? How has parenting changed your perspective?
(2-3 complete sentences)

goals_form.goals_input_label:
Describe what goals you have to improve your life even further, like getting specialized training, starting therapy or counseling, etc.
(2-3 complete sentences)
goals_form.goalsHow_input_label:
How are you working towards achieving these goals? What concrete steps are you taking?
(2-3 complete sentences)

why_form.clearRecordWhy_input_label:
Why do you want to clear your record?
Start with, for example, "I want to clear my record because…"
why_form.clearRecordHow_input_label:
How is your criminal record barring you from achieving your goals?
(2-3 complete sentences)
